name: Kids Coloring 3D LiveBook3D
description:
LiveBook3D a children development application. Our coloring book application will make your pictures live! This is a very exciting and informative game for you and your child.

Features:

- Funny, amazingly beautiful coloring books.

- A wide variety of unique characters.

- Zoom up and move the image to color.

- A mask pattern does not allow going beyond the picture limits in order to make a kid's coloring cute and attractive.

- A unique 3D mode will delight your children.

- Amazing 3D scenes in each coloring.

- Play, rotate, examine and improve your 3D masterpiece.

- A diversity of unique 3D animations will surely appeal to your kids.

- Each 3D animation has its own unique sound.

- Pleasant and melodic background music.

- Enjoy a splendid application design, created with colored pencils by professional artists.

- Soft, pleasant and soothing colors.

- Simple controls will not allow a child to get mixed.

- Commercial-free.

- Regular updates.

With the help of a LiveBook3D application it is possible to turn painted pictures into an unusual colorful world, which allows studying the characters from all sides, playing with them and developing imagination. Enthusiastically looking at different pictures and colors on paper, baby is almost tempted to choose a pencil and show his own artwork. Completed bright pictures will plunge you and your baby into a fantastic world of fairy tales, created with your own hands. Significantly, at each stage of our magic coloring books creation, we followed the advice and recommendations of qualified child psychologists, which guarantees compliance of a developing app for kids with standards and all the professionals' requirements.
